mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{companyNo}
SELECT A.* , B.TYPE_OF_BUSINESS FROM TBL_COMPANY A,TBL_BUSINESS B WHERE A.BUSINESS_CODE = B.BUSINESS_CODE AND COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo }

SELECT A.COMPANY_NO , A.DEPARTMENT_NO , A.DEPARTMENT_NAME , A.DEPARTMENT_CREATE_DATE , A.DEPARTMENT_PHONE , A.UPPER_DEPARTMENT , NVL(cnt,0) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT A,( SELECT DEPARTMENT_NO, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{companyNo} GROUP BY DEPARTMENT_NO ) B WHERE A.COMPANY_NO = #{companyNo} AND A.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.DEPARTMENT_NO(+)
SELECT A.* FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT_UPDATE A WHERE A.COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo } ORDER BY COMPANY_NO,UPDATED_HISTORY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_INSURANCE_RATE VALUES ( #{ companyNo } , SEQ_INSURANCE_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ insuranceRateStartDate } , #{ nationalPensionRate }*0.01 , #{ workersPensionRate }*0.01 , #{ employerPensionRate }*0.01 , #{ healthRate }*0.01 , #{ workersHealthRate }*0.01 , #{ employerHealthRate }*0.01 , #{ longTermCareRate }*0.01 , #{ workersLongTermCareRate }*0.01 , #{ employerLongTermCareRate }*0.01 , #{ unempBenefitRate }*0.01 , #{ workersUnempRate }*0.01 , #{ employerUnempRate }*0.01 , #{ under150EmpRate }*0.01 , #{ over150PriorityEmpRate }*0.01 , #{ under1000EmpRate }*0.01 , #{ over1000EmpRate }*0.01 , #{ commuteAccidentRate }*0.01 , #{ wageBondChargesYn } , #{ wageBondChargesRate }*0.01 , #{ asbestosDamagechargeYn } , #{ asbestosDamagechargeRate }*0.01 , #{ industrialInsuranceRate }*0.01 , #{ businessCode } )
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , B.INDUSTRY_RATE FROM TBL_INSURANCE_RATE A, TBL_BUSINESS B WHERE A.BUSINESS_CODE = B.BUSINESS_CODE AND A.COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo }

SELECT A.* , B.DETAIL_TYPE_OF_BUSINESS , B.INDUSTRY_RATE FROM TBL_INSURANCE_RATE A, TBL_BUSINESS B WHERE A.BUSINESS_CODE = B.BUSINESS_CODE AND A.COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo } AND A.INSURANCE_RATE_START_DATE < SYSDATE AND A.DIV_NO IN ( SELECT MAX(DIV_NO) FROM TBL_INSURANCE_RATE GROUP BY COMPANY_NO )

SELECT A.* ,(SELECT B.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT B WHERE B.DEPARTMENT_NO = (SELECT UPPER_DEPARTMENT FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPARTMENT_NO = #{departmentNum}) ) AS UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT A WHERE A.DEPARTMENT_NO = #{departmentNum} AND A.COMPANY_NO = #{companyNo}
SELECT SEQ_DEPARTMENT_NO.CURRVAL FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_DEPARTMENT_NO'

SELECT A.KOREAN_NAME , B.DEPARTMENT_NAME , A.MEMBER_NO , C.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE A, TBL_DEPARTMENT B , TBL_JOB C WHERE A.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.DEPARTMENT_NO AND A.JOB_NO = C.JOB_NO AND A.DEPARTMENT_NO = #{ departmentNo } AND A.COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo }
SELECT A.* FROM TBL_VACATION_CATEGORY A WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo } ORDER BY A.VACATION_CATEGORY,A.VACATION_NO
SELECT BUSINESS_CODE , TYPE_OF_BUSINESS , DETAIL_TYPE_OF_BUSINESS , INDUSTRY_RATE FROM TBL_BUSINESS WHERE TYPE_OF_BUSINESS || DETAIL_TYPE_OF_BUSINESS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM TBL_SALARY_CRITERIA WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo } ORDER BY USE_STATUS DESC,SALARY_NO ASC
SELECT * FROM TBL_BONUS WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo } ORDER BY USE_YN DESC,BONUS_NO ASC
